name: emilye cox
text: Fast entering and fast exiting. Good system they got going on there. Sometimes they have work release guys there to help.you dump your load. Well they don't since Covid started replacing everyone. But they'll be back when Covid eventually Retires.

name: Albert Golt
text: Very organized and professional.  Also the price is reasonable

name: shane hopkins
text: Easy in and out. Very reasonable prices. Will take tires. No household garbage.

name: Sam Shorrosh
text: It's a landfill, and the folks on deck were helpful.

name: Troy Bookout
text: Easy access and great prices.

name: Tim Caldwell
text: Prices are good and I find the people to be fantastic!!!  No complaints to be mentioned.   I visit probably 8 times a year,  and have never had a problem.

name: Nathan Pitts
text: The rudest people you’ll ever pay for a service. They make you drive over tons of debris with nails and screws instead of using their equipment to push it where ever they want it. They’re rude when you would rather not get for tires. Then, they charge you for it. However, the guy who helps unload is really nice.

name: Dan Adams
text: Much bigger than I expected. Staff is exceptional. Not paid enough, for sure.

name: Jerry Dixon
text: The Lady @ the Scale is a great endorsement for the site. The personal @ the Pitts are courtesy & & will get the load off quickly.

name: Paul Miller
text: I love dumping yard debris here!

name: Jason Davis
text: This rating is only due to the tractor drivers they have hired down there he is the rudest man I have ever met and seems to have a home to pick with me and I don't know this man from Adam but I swear he's got something to say to me Everytime I pull in

name: T&D Professional Tree Removal
text: Very clean to be a dump. Price's aren't bad and the people are nice.

name: Brianna Davis
text: Nice landfill 😉

name: Travis Poling
text: Great!

name: Charlie Overby
text: This landfill is awesome for all your disposal needs! Great prices! Plus the girl working at the scale house is amazing with customer service! I highly recommend this landfill for all your disposal needs.

name: Brian Bates
text: What can you say about the Cullman County Landfill except that it is a dump (pun intended). The staff that weighs you in and out are extremely nice and friendly. The bulldozer staff are always there and willing to lend a hand.

name: Sue Morrow
text:
As a dump goes, this is a decent one. The lady at the window is polite and friendly. There is a place to dump right inside for we household users. Then it gets a little confusing, but just follow traffic. Some of the men that are using the very cool bulldozers will help you unload if you need the help.

All in all, a well run facility. Thanks!

name: Jeff Doss
text: Tha ladies at tha tha scale house were very nice. And good looking.

name: Skyler Brock
text: Easy to get around, the lady's at the scale house are the best.

name: Terry Willcutt
text: Fantastic The lady you pay was very Professional

name: wade graff
text: Lazy workers they make you move so they don't have to work. And just sitting there trucks on their phone. I will use hartselle dump for now on

name: Josh Mims
text: STINKY. "Lowes of Cullman".

name: mark emmert
text: Very friendly staff. My hats off to anyone that has to work in all that garbage to help keep Cullman clean

name: Josh Mims
text: STINKY. "Lowes of Cullman".

name: Randy Green
text: Everyone was very nice

name: Tony T
text: It's a Dump.....

name: Eddie
text: Free month

name: Phil Donnelly
text: Nice and convenient just remember you will be weighed empty your trash or recyclables and then you will pay on your way out it was ten bucks for a truck load of boxes

name: Cody Hausler
text:
Hey,

Thanks for putting up with my over stuffed recycling BS over the year. I know how annoying it must be to unjam my month-long load of Amazon shipments, but just wanted to say I appreciate you, and the giggles I get from your hard efforts.

name: James Miller
text: Requested a bin in July, still waiting, terrible implementation of a program, the old contract with Alliance was ending in July 2019 and their ability to get information out and get the program started is nothing short of a failure. It’s a shame that I have been throwing recyclable materials out now for two months. Sorry but I can’t store months of materials in my garage because RANA can’t get it’s act together. I want to recycle but can’t

name: Kim “kg34ster” Gillies
text:
I heard about the program four different ways prior to registration cutoff.  I signed up and received my new bin in plenty of time to participate in the first pickup.  This is the second month and everything is working well
I also appreciate the email reminder the week of pick up.

name: Joshua B
text: Easier than taking garbage to the curb.  Dropped off old large tv.  Pulled up into drive thru, 2 guys came with a cart, and took out of my car.

name: Kenneth Taylor
text: My bin was promised in August but it wasn’t even deliveed when.

name: Melissa Johnson
text: New to area, my trash cans were supposed to be delivered Friday, June 23. No trash cans arrived. Monday, June 25 was supposed to be our first pick up. I set my own trash cans out before I left town, came home Wednesday evening trash was still there. I paid for my service up front and have not received anything!

name: Bobby Stanford
text: Horrible, horrible, horrible service. We are scheduled for Wednesday service, they never come on Wednesday, sometimes Thursday, sometimes Friday and like this week they didn’t come. Have to call them every week to get them to come out. They alway say that they are running late. Well then change the schedule!!!!!!

name: David Rush
text: Residential service was recently purchased by GFL and after raising prices the service is terrible. Never had to call them prior to GFL and now they have missed two pickups this month. First time they said they were dispatching a truck to pick up, but it never made it either. Their first response is always “what time was you container at the curb”.  Well mine stays there so your crew just didn’t show AGAIN. If you have an option don’t use these jokers

name: P J
text: Did not get my bill by mail or email. Picked up my trash can. Paid all of our bill when we found out. Called 4 times to get a trash can again and it has been 3 weeks. Every time I call they tell me they see no order for a trash can and have to order it again. Spoke to one manager who was very indifferent. Called again yesterday and they said they put the notes in the system. I asked to speak to manager and they said they would have someone call and no one has called me and it’s the next day. Terrible service.

name: Sponge bob (darkstars)
text: Ok new company maybe but not a very good one they are now 7 days late to pick up everyone's garbage called them 4 days ago after waiting 15 minutes on hold they said they would come pick it up guess what still no pickup but i bet trash prices will go up just so we can get very BAD Service

name: Brenda McNeely
text: The men whom pick up my trash broke the lid in January and I called and complained about the situation and I was on hold for roughly an hour and then opted for a call back but it only rang once and they hung up.  I have gone three weeks without service but when I recently talked to a representative they stated that I called and canceled my services but I never did.  It is now March and I still don't have a replacement can which was promised to me back in January and for the past three weeks they have passed by my can which is on the curve and have not picked up my trash.

name: Shug
text: I work for a veterinary clinic in the local area and and since Advance Disposal sold our account to this company we have not had a pick up . I call Advance disposal and they said I have to call this company well they never answer the phone 3 weeks of calling and nothing. I sat on the phone 45 min and then the automated service ended the call for waiting so long. This is beyond irritating . We pay for pick up every Wednesday never missed a payment but they can not pick up the trash for 3 weeks ???? This is very upsetting and as soon as we find another pick up service we will be switching .   Not happy if I can give  a neg star I would So far it doesn’t even deserve one star.

name: Jonathan Wright
text:
I have been waiting on a replacement can and a second can for 3 months. I call every week and get the same answer over and over. They clearly don’t know what customer service is.

Can I give them a one star?!

name: Joshua King
text: Other then not pulling trucks out they look out for folks that bring trash there

name: michael holley
text: We have 4, 8 yard dumpsters that have not been emptied in going on 2 months. Have tried calling numerous times and can't talk to anyone. I have sent emails but still no response. This company is a joke.

name: Stephanie Granger
text: This is the worst service company I've ever dealt with.  The corporate customer service tries to be helpful, but the Tallassee operation has not responded.  I have called 3 times over a 9 day period.  Trash is coming out my ears, while my full can sits on the road with zero attention.

name: cody longshore
text: Always getting missed.  Been calling about a busted can for 3 months that has not been replaced but I still get a bill for pickup.  Worst customer service ever.

name: Jean Moe-Prince
text:
When I first arrived in Ala I had no idea how things worked.  After all I was from the big city where things just happened.  When beginning my service the office staff took the time to explain what needed to be done and how to pay (in the big city they just added your bill to your taxes) so to enable me service I was advised I had to have the can on the road by a certain time and I could pay every three months.  The service pick up is always on time and I have absolutely no problems with how the program is run.

I wish to thank everyone at Advanced for helping me adjust to the country way of life IT IS GREAT

name: Melody Hep
text: Absolutely the worst company I have dealt with my whole life  I have called several times and have been promised 4 different dates I would get a trash can. Yes this is for new service. Well yesterday was the 4th promised date and low and behold I still have no trash can. These people here to need to be retrained and if lying is what they like to do they need to become a lawyer or politician. I'm past few up and sick of being nice to these people

name: Daniel Gresham
text: I've never had an issue with them

name: Jamie Thornton
text: Trash pickup is always prompt! Any questions can easily answered via website or calling the office! Price is more than fair! Been a loyal customer for years and will continue to do so!

name: Erika Scott
text: My Advanced Disposal service is always good.  My garbage is always picked on Tuesday morning like clockwork! I know these guys get up early in the morning in all kinds of weather conditions to make sure the garbage is disposed of in a timely manner.  I know of one instance where my garbage wasn't picked up for two weeks because of a change in drivers.  I called the Tallassee office and spoke with a representative there and she got right on the job of making sure that it was picked up as soon as possible.  I appreciated that!

name: Andrea Carol Carter
text: I have the complete misfortune of being a long time customer. It’s a crying shame that I don’t have another trash option. It would take a while for me to elaborate on all the awful experiences I have had with this disposal company.

name: Daniel Spies
text: I set up service a month ago. It took them 2 weeks to deliver the can. Since then they have  yet to come back and take way my garbage since they have two pick up days this week and the last. I know there’s a pandemic going on but this is ridiculous.

name: Penny Pratt
text: My husband and I moved here to Eclectic recently. I paid in advance for services. I have had had to call three weeks in a row because our trash is not being picked up on the date it is supposed to be picked up. I am really disappointed and hoping someone will pick up my trash again this week. It is Friday now and was supposed to be picked up on Wednesday.

name: Pam Beaird
text: Picks up about 1/2 of the time.  Impossible to get a credit.  Cuts you off if you don't pay for services you didn't receive.  Lots of time spent on the telephone trying to correct billing.  Very difficult to deal with.

name: Kevin Yolanda
text: We should have read the reviews prior.  Customer service sucks.  They didn’t pick up our trash on the designated day.  Then told us they were running behind and changed the story to they came by but you had too much trash (the lid didn’t close). They then attempted to charge us 25$ additional dollars to come back and pick up the trash.   The customer service agent said she spoke to here supervisor whom she reported stated that they wouldn’t pick it up anyways because the lid was not closed. So my question now is ... what kind of scam are they running and are they monopolizing and taking advantage of rural county residents.  Rest assured I will be finding this out.

name: Julie Tompkins
text: Drivers are bad about breaking trash cans and spilling trash in the street. When your can is broken it can take weeks and multiple calls to the office to get a new one brought out to your home.  I will say the cost for the service is very reasonable.

name: Russell Widhalm
text: Horrible company.  Had 2 interviews in which my qualifications, ability to do the job, and skills weren't even mentioned, just blah blah blah about how great the company was for 90 minutes each time.  Then got an email thanking me for my interest but they had selected another candidate...3 months later after no contact with them (they put me on hold and didn't pick up when I called back to see what the hell was going on).  And it was a mass email.  Yep, they couldn't even be bothered to address their rejection EMAIL to me personally.  Fitting that they are in the garbage collection industry, because that's what this company is...garbage!

name: Tim McQueen
text: They ripped the lid off my can and regularly leave trash on the street.

name: Linda Weeks
text: I know these guys on the truck have their work cut out for them - my only complaint is that "sometimes" my garbage can is turned over.   But for the most part - rain, sleet, snow or sunshine - they are out there on Tuesday mornings - getting that garbage picked up.   I try to remember them every Christmas by tipping them to let them know how much I appreciate them.

name: Lisa Flinn
text: We live on a dirt road and when it rains in the past we have had to call for pick-up.  They don't want to come up the road because of the road.  We have no problems coming up and down the road so I don't see why they would have a problem.

name: Nic Freeman
text: literally the trash is picked up half the time. this is the kind of service you get when there's no competition. there's no reason for them to do the service you're paying them to do because there's no where else to get the service. how hard could it possibly be to go to a house and pick up a can. it's literally the easiest job in the world and they can't do it. our trash just piles up. so we have to find other ways to get rid of it.

name: CASH OWENS
text: When we had your service, it was great, very reliable and always clean...however trying to end service with you has been impossible! We cancelled our service on 8/25/2016, I received bills until 06/2017 after numerous calls from your colllections department and our sales rep "Ray" it was decided that it was an error on your part and would be credited now i have received a letter from an ATTORNEY. I called the local office again and they see that a credit was supposed to be created but never was. So KUDOS for aggravating what was a possible returning customer, KUDOS for your unwavering collections department, KUDOS for the excellent customer service on a local level for NEVER doing what they say!When we had your service, it was great, very reliable and always clean...however trying to end service with you has been impossible! We cancelled our service on 8/25/2016, I received bills until 06/2017 after numerous calls from your colllections department and our sales rep "Ray" it was decided that it was an error on your part and would be credited now i have received a letter from an ATTORNEY. I called the local office again and they see that a credit was supposed to be created but never was. So KUDOS for aggravating what was a possible returning customer, KUDOS for your unwavering collections department, KUDOS for the excellent customer service on a local level for NEVER doing what they say!

name: Linda Ledbetter
text:
I have not gotten a bill since last summer.  I called and paid when I thought it might be due.  In January, my father had a stroke.  During the time he was in the hospital and later in hospice, I did not call to ask them if I could pay a bill.
Today, they took my trash can...still no bill, or phone call, or late notice.

I guess I'll get a barrel and burn my trash and recycle everything possible.  Advanced Disposal is the most UNPROFESSIONAL company I have EVER used in my 60 years!!!

name: Sam And Oliver
text: Having to deal with this business, especially as of late, has been beyond frustrating! The trash is USUALLY picked up, but when we have an issue with not being serviced or random, unapproved, and not-mentioned fees appearing on the bill, we always get a customer service rep with a tone or attitude. They never help us with our issue, the drivers seem to find any excuse to not have to stop and pickup, and they have admitted to blatantly closing request cases for past issues we've had with the company. I have never had to contact a business more in my life to do their job correctly- one that we pay them for and have HIRED them to do each month (payment being due at beginning of each month BEFORE services are even rendered mind you). Lord forbid if we didn't pay them on time.

name: Puppy Dog
text:
Call for service.  Container was dropped at home in 2 days.  Great service.  Short and Simple.

Thanks Advanced Disposal

name: Brandon Bender
text: USELESS - continue to miss our entire neighborhood ( over 100 homes) and never make it up. And it was not even cold or raining. NO EXCUSES. happened twice in last 60 days. also took 30 days to even get my trash can.

name: Mallory McDaniel
text: I just want to let someone know how terrible this service has been. I moved into Advanced Disposal's service area last year, and the treatment that I have recieved has been terrible. First, I had to call to set up services a couple different times because no one would answer the phone. The person who handles my route will sometimes completely skip my trashcan and often makes a huge mess. I haven't received a bill from Advanced Disposal in some time, and my trashcan was recently taken. This didn't happen to just me; my neighbors also have not received bills, and their containers were removed as well. I called a couple of times but hung up out of frustration with the very long wait. No one should wait 10 minutes for a business to answer a phone. When I finally got someone, I was told that my account was moved to collections. I find that odd seeing as I never received a bill or a past-due notice. As someone who has no idea how often I should be receiving a bill, I didn't know that I owed payment. I just had service reinstated, and it cost $200. That is ridiculous. I do not appreciate this company.

name: Jackie. Thorpe
text: Always fast if you need them.never had a problem with them.

name: Robin Taylor
text: No complaints on the collection end.  It took much longer than it should to get a replacement collection bin in my experience.

name: Dina Campbell
text: We've had garbage pick-up with Advanced Disposal for years.  We've never experienced any problems and service has always been great and on time.  Thank you!

name: Rhonda Stover
text: Absolutely horrible service and billing is a nightmare. You will be lucky to get a can within a month of paying for the service. In the beginning, you have to pay 3 months....but b4 my service even got started, I had received an additional bill..... just embarrassingly dreadful.... ppl get it together!

name: Oscar Fernandez
text: Went there for work.

name: Jason Deem
text: The absolute worst service provider I've ever dealt with. When there are available options pick anyone over this horrible company.

name: Jo DeGraffenried
text: I have not had any problems with my service, I find they are very efficent and on time. Thank you

name: James Shaffer
text: Have to call each week to pick up  Garbage always late

name: James Mills
text: Advance Disposal is highly dependable, extremely affordable, and seems to ecologically concerned. . .everything you would want in a community partner!

name: Chris Dixon
text: Good people to deal with, always fair and honest.

name: Kimberly
text: This is by far the worst service I've ever had to deal with. They haven't picked up my trash but one time in the month that I've had service with them, and that's because I called and went off to get it picked up. The supervisor says they will send someone and never does. I'm beyond fed up and I'm calling corporate on the tallassee location. If y'all are too sorry to do your job then give it to someone that will do it.

name: marty ingram
text: I have tried and tried to call and no answer.

name: Wendy Kidd
text: The arms are not good on the trucks. They miss a lot of garbage. We have fallen garbage all over the place around our neighborhood. I think they should go back to manning the garbage removal.

name: mitchedg
text: Great service. Keep up the hard work!!!

name: j grif
text: 2 main things - trucks allow trash to fly out while going down the rd; horrible for the environment. Cost per month continues to grow.

name: Christal Jeter
text: Terrible service it's really unfortunate, that this is the only company that service our area!

name: John Scott
text: Knowledgeable and professional service.

name: Kristy Morris
text: Impossible to communicate with.

name: Ben Pope
text: The trash pickup crew is always late, like around 3:00 o'clock, needs to be more propt.

name: Dristin Johnson
text: Paid for my service to start over a month ago still waiting for a trashcan to be delivered. My Husband and I have both called on numerous occasions and we just get the run around. I received a bill last week for a service that hasn't even started yet!

name: Slime love
text: Wife called to cancel trash they said send an e-mail or hand write letter did both guess what 3 calls to them and 2 months later service is still at old address now today is 2-24-15 ---- NOW THAT'S TRASH SERVICE.....

name: traci fecteau
text: Great service

name: keith etheridge
text: Good service

name: Brent Meadows (Bm2014)
text: They aren't consistent

name: Jennifer Darnell
text:
Waste Management was the company I dealt with prior to GFL. They came on time and did not charge extra for a mid week pickup when our cans were full again.

GFL wants to charge $25 for an extra pickup when our bill is $60 for the quarter. I was advised I can also go to my local dump site - 1.5 hours from my home. Our only other option is to wait 5 more days for pickup or burn the trash during a no burn warning. Thanks, GFL.

name: curtis martin
text: I've used this company for over 7 years. I've had a couple of times when i really was in a mess, i would call and they would always give 100% to get my problem settled. Ive been happy with the service i get from them we have 6 40 yard containers that they service and they always makes sure when they pick up they get anything that is dropped . They carry about 350 loads a year from here and no problems has happened that Zac has not taken care of. I have other company's come by and say they can do a better job but when i really look at there customers they are not happy. So  im staying with REPUBLIC and highly recommend them.

resp.text: Hello Curtis, Thank you for taking the time to post your review.  Republic Services has a long and proud history of reliably meeting the needs of our customers.  We are very proud of our dedicated team of professionals who take personal responsibility for serving our customers with care. We appreciate your business!

name: Darrick English
text: Robin McBurnett is the most professional, hardworking lady in business! She is a great asset for Repubkic Service !  I have never had any issues with delivery or anything , she definitely make sure that everything is on time ! I appreciate Republic Service !!!

resp.text: Hello Darrick, Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We are committed be respectful, responsible, reliable, resourceful and relentless to provide the best customer experience. I am glad to hear we are staying true to our values.

name: mike cothran
text: I have used Republic Services for many years and have been satisfied with the service from the pick-ups and especially from my rep Robin McBurnett. Robin always takes care of what ever problem I may have and works well with my Managers in this area.

resp.text: Hello Mike, Thank you for taking the time to post your review.  Republic Services has a long and proud history of reliably meeting the needs of our customers.  We are very proud of our dedicated team of professionals who take personal responsibility for serving our customers with care. We appreciate your business!

name: james blair
text: I have removed service. Yet republic has billed me for 3 months of service that I have not used them. I changed service because the new representative system uses a call center based format from a local office. The call center never resolves my problem. To clarify once my rep went from Robin to Charles Davis I got very poor service. At that time I decided to cancel service and go with a local company. Once I canceled service my rep has not fixed my billing errors. Corporate says they have emailed Charles to fix the errors but has not fixed them. At this point the time is greater than 2 work days trying to resolve this problem. My advice would be to switch to another local company that has better billing practices and prices as I have.

resp.text: Hi James, please accept our apologies for your frustrations and I am disappointed we have lost your business. I would like to look further into your concerns. Please send me an email to ccrm@republicservices.com. Please include your service address, contact information, and a copy of your original review. Thank you.

name: Manuel Cabral
text: Wonderful place, love it.

resp.text: Hi Manuel, thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We appreciate you.

name: rayvenjackson11
text: Missed pick up 3 weeks in a row!

resp.text: Hello, Please accept our apologies for this breakdown in service. We would love to have the opportunity to resolve this issue. Please send us an email to CCRM@Republicservices.com subject line Google Review. Please include your address and contact information  with a copy of your post. We hope to hear back from you soon. Thank you!

name: PIKACHU CATPRO100
text: I heard  Calhoun county is looking for a new garbage company because I guess waste Management gave up a fancy disposal so I think Republic service would be a good choice for Calhoun county because we can have recycling for once  and PUBLIC SERVICE IF YOU DECIDE TO BE CALHOUN COUNTY'S GARBAGE COMPANY PLEASE DO SO SO WE CAN HAVE SOME RECYCLING  AND TRASH HERE

resp.text: Hi Pikachu, thank you so much for taking the time to leave us a review. We appreciate you.

name: Annie Simane
text: Call to request a quote. Very unprofessional.

resp.text: Hello Annie,  Thank you for sharing your experience. This is not representative of who we are or how we do business. We apologize for any inconvenience and want to investigate this matter right away. Please send us an email with your address and contact information to CCRM@Republicservices.com along with a copy of your post. enabling us to communicate with our local team for resolution.  We hope to hear back from you soon.  Thank you.  FL

name: Melissa Veitengruber
text:
These workers are incredibly rude. Truck #2463 with two men inside decided to blare their horn multiple times early this morning in Anniston, up on Diana Hills, as they were picking up trash. I went to the door to see if maybe an animal or person was in their way, but nope. They continued to blare the horn several times while I watched them, for no reason whatsoever. Luckily I was awake, but other neighbors who work night shift or might have small children probably weren’t so lucky.
Talk about terrible customer service.

name: Joan Trussell
text:
If I could give Calhoun county waste disposal a zero rating I would. Our garbage has been on the road for 3 days. Called Lincoln ofc and was told they missed pick up for our road and they would have someone out to pick up garbage. Here it is almost 5 pm. No pick up!
Not the first time they have not picked up on scheduled day.

name: Suzanne Leonard
text: This morning I woke up to a mess in my yard. The container was dumped over, two trash bags on the ground and the metal handle dislodged. My neighbor has it worse. Unbelievable.

name: Lola Nelson
text:
I was on hold for over 20 min before I could even talk to anyone, how can something like that happen?
They are rude and have absolutely no idea what they're talking about.

name: Justin Stroup
text: Their service is very bad they won’t empty the can that I pay extra for missed it 3 times in a mouth. Customer service is very bad called asked them to dump it a still they wouldn’t.

name: Max Brown
text: This place has awful service I always pay on time and they come got my can now I have to send someone there Monday with my bank statements for proof of pmt. This place is joke😡

name: Tiffany Laminack
text: VERY poor customer service. Very UNtrustworthy. I wish there were other garbage services.

name: David Burchfield
text: Hard to check job opens

name: Esteban Junior
text:
(Translated by Google) They no longer want money .... horrible horrible, $$$$ ....

(Original)
Ellos no mas quieren dinero....horrible horrible, $$$$....

name: shane hopkins
text: Quick in and out. Dirt road needs addressed. Holes that'll destroy your suspension.

name: Greg Oliver
text: It was a dump!

name: Ken Foster
text: Great landfill and the staff have been very friendly.  If you have a question they will gladly answer it.  Best landfill I have ever used.

name: Chaz Stennett
text: Horrible customer service at this place. How hard is it to be nice. I realize they work around trash all day but no reason to be like that.

name: jeff dunn
text: very easy in and out. price was reasonable.

name: Paul Strickland
text: Awesome service in and out in 15 min with huge load of household, metal, and appliances

name: Tammy Nance
text:
Very poor attitudes. Double standards, typical bureaucracy. Rules apply for some one day, and others don't.
If you consider customer service getting cucked by Lil Ole ladies with poor comprehension, you will love magnolia landfill.

name: Allen Grimes
text: Great landfill

name: Matthew Jones
text: There is no 0 star rating. Don’t waste your time like I did. Your best bet is to call Junk King. This landfill was going to charge me $215 to bring my trash to them and dump it myself, I turned around and took it home with me. The guys at Junk King came to my home within the hour and picked it up for almost half the price.

name: Miguel Vigueras
text: This place is not for the average contractor or person. First they ask you to wear a vest and a hat , which I understand for safety but then the next time I come over they increase the minimum charge at $200 dollars. Anywhere else minimum charge is $30 dollars.

name: Jeff Franklin
text: Rude and over priced . Worthless company. Living up to the job “trashy” customer service

name: Ron Dometrovich
text: I went there with a 5 by 8' utility trailer  With some construction debris  from a home improvement project.  I went there  expecting to pay a $47 minimum like I had the last time I was there.They wanted to charge me $200 to dump it. How is this justifiable?

name: Andrew Davenport
text: $200.00 minimum for 4tons. I weighed at 3.51 tons. I was charged $324.68 for my load that was under the minimum. I asked what the extra 124.68 was and she said "taxes and fees". I asked for a breakdown and she couldn't give me an answer. DON"T USE THIS FACILITY!!

name: GSD Schutzhund
text: Their "COVOID-19 POLICY" is to pull your load on the scale.  Walk to office door.  Communication is with their walkie talkie hanging on the door. You will be required to wear a HARD HAT with YELLOW SAFETY SHIRT or SAFETY VEST.

name: Billy Ritch
text: 47.00 minimum, only accepts cards, doesn't provide pymt receipt, nor weigh ticket. Has a handheld radio outside for you to provide card # for pymt. If there was anyplace else, I would never use this place. Overpriced, ridiculous extremes in place over the rona.

name: Dustin Knowles
text: Avoid it. Cost too much and have too much hassle to dump there.

name: Butch Roberts
text: This is the second week in a row this has happened, my wife watched the truck pull up dump the can which none of the trash went into the truck set it down over half full and drive off, unbelievable!!! Something needs to be done about this.

name: Robert Cowens
text: For the most part they are on time. Have had to call them on several occasions concerning missed trash pickup days. The county has decided to keep running the service. Price will increase, let's see if quality of service gets better along with that.

name: Mike norris
text: This is my moms garbage can, she is an elderly women having to drag this broken trash can, she has reported it 2 times and nothing has been done, but they like to collect your money.

name: Brian Guenzler
text:
Same sentiments as most people here. Missed pickups every other week.
Always excuses of truck is broke down, or they must have run extra early.

name: Darrell Perry
text: Poor service. You pay your bill. But they only pick up your trash when it’s convenient for them. Piss poor run business!!

name: Hexagon
text: Poor service, rarely picks up on scheduled day.  Driver will not get out of the truck for anything.  If the can lands in the middle of the road, he drives off.  Department is managed very poorly.

name: Christy Miller
text: They haven’t picked up my trash every week like they r paid to do . Always get the house at the end of the road but doesn’t come down to get mine or my neighbors.

name: Will Winchester
text: Horrible! I’ve had them for months and they either don’t pick up or they just send my payments back. If anyone wants a more reliable service the wind blows by and picks up more garbage.

name: Will
text:
They didn't pick up garbage on the pickup day. I left my can out by the a street overnight and my can has gone missing.

I have called them about getting a replacement can, they said they'd bring one out, they haven't.  Now they dont answer the phone.

name: Angela Trussell
text: Did not pickup my garbage again. I requested a new can because I had to duct tape it together so I can put my garbage in it. If paying for service I expect to recieve it.

name: Ann Prescott
text: The garbage truck  arm broke my can in several places. Raccoon getting into the can every night. Multiple calls and no one responds or bring out a replacement can. Very very frustrating

name: Barry Gillott
text: Polite people

name: Noah Allinder
text: I’ve had my garbage sitting out there over a week this time and they still haven’t picked it up it’s starting to overflow into the house because I have no where else to put it . This is ridiculous

name: Angela Blake
text: I pay to have ALL my garbage dumped from my can....not half of it!!!!!!

name: Tessa Puckett
text:
I have been waiting over a month now for a trash can. Just moved here. No intermediate solution in the meantime. Cannot buy your own trashcan even if it fits make and model.

In the meantime, we are overflowing with trash. We do not have a truck where it would be simple to take our trash to the landfill. It has been a nightmare.

Put my order in on May 17th. Moved in on May 22nd. Now it is July 2nd and they still do not even have any trash cans in inventory.

Love the receptionist I speak to. But this company does not have their business handled. And it is absolutely ridiculous. Especially when a service like this is essential for us as a family of 5.

name: Leigh Evans
text: 1) Randomly didn’t pick up our trash. 2) Turned around in the drive and dug up grass beside the driveway. 3) I called and was on hold 10 min only for her to say she had “no idea” why he didn’t pick up our trash. *** If you’re going to do a job, do it well. No matter what you do!

name: Christina Mohney
text: Not their address. Spent 10 minutes trying to find it to only figure out it was 10 miles in the other direction. Street name is Highway 118, not 78.

name: Savanna Key
text: Do not pay these folks with a check. It will take them weeks to cash it.

name: Absolute Termite and Pest Control
text: Nice staff, minimum fee for dump has almost double to 85 dollars! Bring one mattress and it will cost you 85 dollars..... Wonder why you see piles of trash dumped on the side of roads in the country...easily the most expensive site to dump anything. half price in Montgomery BTW

name: Michael Sims
text: This company sucks. Can't get an answer on the phone. I have been trying to get a replacement trash can for months still haven't received one. They keep giving me a date but no trash can.

name: Stephen Potts
text: Wonderful staff

name: 잭팟
text:
(Translated by Google) New Year's Castle is over there.

(Original)
새해성은저기있는거죠..지도찾아가면 시내에서헤멤ㅋㅋ

name: S B
text:
Normally a great experience here but lately and today 5/12/21 it seems like wait times have gotten longer and ALL employees take lunch at the same time for a COMPLETE HOUR.  The lunch “hour” turned into a 90 Minute wait to enter the gate.

A better business practice would be to alternate lunch breaks to accommodate inbound shipments to avoid the situation of truck drivers running out of hours to work then FORCED to leave and driving in violation of federal law leaving Waste Management liable being we as drivers cannot over park anywhere on site. Us truck drivers can only work a certain amount of hours per day unlike the site workers.

resp.text: We are sorry to hear about your experience and would like to investigate this further. Please email your complete service address along with a copy of your post to wmcares@wm.com subject line GOOGLE REVIEWS, and we will reach out immediately.

name: John Clark
text:
Long wait time to be unloaded.
Prepare to spend several  hours.
Hopefully  I will not have to ever come back.

resp.text: We are sorry to hear about your experience and would like investigate this further. Please email your complete service address along with a copy of your post to wmcares@wm.com subject line GOOGLE REVIEWS, and we will reach out immediately.

name: White Guy
text: I come here almost daily. They take pretty good care of you if you dump in the landfill.

resp.text: Jeremy Baldwin, we are so happy to read such a great review about Waste Management - Emelle Hazardous Waste Facility!

name: Preacher Paul
text: Nice people, easy to work with nice delivery.

resp.text: Preacher Paul, your wonderful feedback and rating mean a lot to us.

name: Greg McCoy
text: Trucker friendly staff and lots of room.

resp.text: Greg Mccoy, thanks for the kind comments about our team. We strive to deliver an excellent experience!

name: Mark Dolinar
text: There delivery hours a terrible small window 2 make delivers only 4 hours from 7am 2 11am..they do except delivers on fridays and its a long wait 2 get umloaded.

name: John Cutler
text: A little slow on the startup. They do what is required and are professional.

resp.text: Thank you, John , for taking the time to let us know how we did. We hope you have a great day!

name: Brian Finke
text: Unprofessional unacceptable wait times drivers spend several hours waiting to dump drivers end up losing drive time they could othwise be using to pickup their next load strongly recommend using another facility

name: Jaren Lacey
text: Has to be the worst trash service possible. I have missed two pickups now. They say that when it's weather related that you have to deal with your trash on your own and they will not return the money. I can understand that, yet this past Monday there were absolutely no weather issues in the state of Alabama and they are refusing to pick up yet again. Please explain.

resp.text: Hello Jaren, Please accept our apologies for this breakdown in service. We would love to have the opportunity to resolve this issue, please send me an email to ccrm@republicservices.com. Please include your service address, contact information, and a copy of your original review. Thank you.

name: Lillian W
text: If they weren't my only opinion I wouldn't use this company the trash truck driver destroyed my can and I haven't even had it 6 months

name: Stephen Shaw
text: Absolutely terrible, unprofessional, lazy. They always leave trash behind .. This past week when they came by to pick up the recycling Truck # 2418 (USDOT 962089) left the most amount of trash laying in the yard and street I have ever seen, and the can was just laying over. No care in the world to get out of the seat and fix the problem.

resp.text: Hello Stephen, Thank you for bringing this issue to our attention. We would like to report this, please send us an email to CCRM@Republicservices.com with your city and state, the date this occurred, and your contact information. Thank you! FL

name: Jonathan Piper
text: They are a big joke I'd recommend burning your trash you will be better off

resp.text: Hi Jonathan, Please accept our apologies for your frustration. Please send us an email to CCRM@Republicservices.com subject line Google Review. Please include your address and contact information with a copy of your post. We hope to hear back from you soon. Thank you! FL

name: misty owens
text: Repeated missed pick ups and they say theyll be here the next day. They never show until the next pickup day next week!  Meanwhile trash is overflowing to the point where we immediately fill the can as soon as it is dumped. Its obsurd and a monopoly seeing as we are offered no other choice!!

resp.text: Hi Misty, Please accept our apologies for your frustration. We would like to contact the local division on your behalf and resolve any issues you are experiencing. Please provide your address and contact information via email at CCRM@Republicservices.com along with a copy of your post and we will look into this right away. We hope to hear from you soon.

name: Joe Jackson
text: I've had service with you for 4 months and today  3-9-2021 Mark's the 4th time you're driver knocked my can into the ditch and drove away leaving the garbage . This is unacceptable,  I only have 1 can . Ya'll should be shut down and contract cancelled.

resp.text: Hi Joe, thank you for bringing this to our attention and I apologize for your frustrations with the service. I would like to look further into this. Please send me an email to ccrm@republicservices.com. Please include your service address, contact information, and a copy of your original review. Thank you.

name: Tasha Reaves
text:
I have 2 cans I pay for the extra one of course
I think in past year they’ve not picked the 2nd can up probably 10+ times wonder if I’m only one with this problem
They dump trash all over road every time any and all trash picked up on our street
So annoying I’ve calll too many times to count to complain

resp.text: Hi Tasha, I am so sorry for your frustrations with this. I would like to contact the local management team on your behalf. Please send me an email to ccrm@republicservices.com. Please include your service address, contact information, and a copy of your original review. Thank you.

name: Patrick Tays
text: The phone people are "nice." The take your payment details and promise NOTHING. Miss a pick-up? Tough. Miss a 'can?' So what- trying to correct something with them is like talking to a rock..

resp.text: Hi Patrick, please accept our apologies for this breakdown in service. I would like to look into this concern right away. Please send me an email to CCRM@Republicservices.com. Please include your service address, contact information, and a copy of your original review. Thank you. DR

name: Samantha Wood
text: I honestly wish we had another option for waste disposal in our area. Republic services has been so unprofessional with us. We've had our whole neighborhood skipped before and them promise to have someone out the next day, only for it to be another week before trash was picked up.

resp.text: Hello Samantha, Please accept our apologies for this breakdown in service. We would love to have the opportunity to resolve this issue, please send us an email with your service address and contact information to CCRM@Republicservices.com along with a copy of your post and we will look into this right away. Thank you!

name: peggy saint
text: No reason to wait a week to get a can they tore the lid off. We take care of our can. Bring off road after they pick up. Called when we went to bring in & reported. Now half full of rain water. Had to leave can on road, which we never do. Garbage pick up due tomorrow & still with broken can. Very below par lazy customer service

name: Carson Barrett
text: Absolutely abysmal customer service, calling gets nothing solved, every time I go up there, nobody is in the building ever. I wish I could use a different service. It's almost better to do without

name: Shane Prater
text: You would think that the people who pick up tree limbs would get all of them. Lazy lazy people they don't come off the truck to pick up what they can't get with the truck. It's their job to pick it all up. Albertville needs to go back to doing garbage pick up and other pick up services through the city.

resp.text: Hello Shane,  We apologize for the breakdown in yard waste service.  We would like to further investigate and address this issue. Please send us an email to CCRM@Republicservices.com with a copy of your post, service address, and contact information. Thank you.  FL

name: Rollie Rainer
text: Will not pick up my yard waste even though the facility is not even a mile away. Pathetic company

resp.text: Hi Rollie, I apologize for your frustrations with your yard waste not being serviced. I would like to contact the local office on your behave to resolve these issues. Please send me an email to CCRM@Republicservices.com. Please include your service address, contact information, and a copy of your original review. Thank you. DR

name: Jessica Rogers
text: Wish there was another company to use. They are terrible customer service has no idea what goes on at the local office and the local office doesn't abide by what customer service tells you. Its utterly ridiculous. If you ever have a choice i recommend using someone else.

name: Joey W
text: A bean counter somewhere decided that the best way to do everything would be to block the general public from contacting a local office. So you get someone at a call center a thousand miles away  who is unfamiliar with your area and what  is allowed and what options you have.  I have been unable to get a dumpster for all of the back and fourth for about a week now.  Guess who is about to show up on this businesses local doorstep to try to sort out the issue?   This guy.  Very very frustrating. 4 calls, 4 different quotes, 4 different people who don’t know the other person.

name: Amelia Sanders
text: First over the almost two years I used their services there were multiple times my garbage was not emptied.  Then when I call to cancel services I am told that because I have already paid for the month that that payment is like "insurance" and is nonrefundable for the 4 weeks they will not be picking up.  I don't understand how companies like this do business.  Not recommended.

resp.text: Hi, We apologize for your frustrations regarding this billing issue. We'd like to look into this right away. Please email us your service address at CCRM@Republicservices.com along with a copy of your post and good contact number.  Thank you.  FL

name: BR 549
text: If I could, I would rate this company 0 stars. They have a wacky billing cycle for the area, every 3 months. Their customer service is terrible. I have asked and asked for paper bills, and have yet to see one. And, if you are lucky to get your bill, they’ll throw an additional $35 service fee randomly. Oh, and if you Miss a payment, it’ll be about $175.00 to restart your service. Unlike the cities that contract the bill through the residents water bill, the people in the county have to deal with these unprofessional clowns directly. If I had a choice, I would choose a different company to do my business.

name: A
text: The worst customer service I have ever encountered. Guy came to my house, went IN my carport to retrieve my can for non payment of a bill I haven't received. Showed up in a white box truck, with Ryder truck rental on the side of it, his uniform said OTTO on it, nothing to indicate that he was with Republic Services. When stopped and questioned about what he was doing he was rude and argumentative. I had to make him show me the back of his truck, because I honestly didn't believe he was with the garbage company at 1st. He couldn't show me any paperwork other than a chart that said I had 2 cans, I only have and always have only one. Then threatened to call the police when I tried several times to get a number for me to call. Once I was able to get a number and talk to a Tammy ? I was told a supervisor would be calling me back in about an hour. 3 hours later and no call and Tammy will not answer.

name: Josh Mims
text: All the time "some how missing my garbage can". Not worth paying for, but no other option.

resp.text: Hi Josh, thank you for bringing this to our attention. I would like to look further into this concern. Please send me an email to CCRM@Republicservices.com. Please include your service address, contact information, and a copy of your original review. Thank you. DR

name: Samantha Doty
text: Most horrible rude customer service!!!!! I hate that we have no other options for trash pick up!

name: Paige Allen
text: Worst customer service ever .

resp.text: Hi , thank you for bringing this issue to our attention. Please send us an email with your contact information and service to CCRM@Republicservices.com along with a copy of your post. We hope to hear back from you soon. Thank you. FL

name: Of The Dawn
text: My garbage is missed constantly.  The recycle hasn't been picked up since before labor day.

resp.text: Hi Of, Please accept our apologies for this breakdown in service. We would like to contact the local division on your behalf and resolve any issues you are experiencing. Please send us an email to CCRM@Republicservices.com. Please include your service address, contact information, and your original review. Thank you. DR

name: Levi Taylor
text: 0 star service. Billing is terrible and customer service is the worst. I hate that this is the only option for garbage pick up in the area.

resp.text: Hi Levi, please accept our apologies for your frustrations with your billing and the customer service. If there is something I can look into, please send me an email to CCRM@Republicservices.com. Please include your service address, contact information, and a copy of your original review. Thank you. DR

name: Brittany Eller
text: These folks are the most incompetent I've dealt with in a very long time. They claim a payment was returned and refuse to see my bank statement proving otherwise. For that, the can was taken and not returned until I paid an unnecessary reinstatement fee and was caught up in full. It took over a month to receive said can. Fast forward to 3 months later - they want all fees paid AGAIN and are now charging me for TWO cans. What in the world?! Lawd help this company. They deserve negative stars. It's a shame we have no other garbage pick-up options.

name: Megan Stone
text: Call after call gets nothing done. I've complained about the garbage truck running around and picking up cans off our driveway, because I have incompetent neighbors. They continue to do so, breaking asphalt, creating potholes in our driveway, and tearing up my neighbor's yard. Lazy and incompetent service, to say the least.

name: j b burgett
text: This is the poorest excuse for a trash company ever . Pay your bill and they won't pick it up half the time and it's impossible to get anything accomplished on the phone . So basically you pay for services you don't receive

resp.text: Hello JB, I apologize for your experience. This is not how we conduct business, I would like the chance to correct this behavior and make things right. Please send us an email with your address and contact information to CCRM@Republicservices.com along with a copy of your post. Thank you for bringing this to our attention, look forward to hearing from you soon. FL

name: Lane Ratzlaff
text: Absolutely awful customer service!!!!....a missed pick up on Wed. Promised a pick up by Friday....no pick up as of Saturday....happens all the time

resp.text: Hi Lane, I am so sorry your pickup has not been recovered yet. I would like to look further into this. Please send me an email to CCRM@Republicservices.com. Please include your service address, contact information, and a copy of your original review. Thank you. DR

name: Celeste Croley
text: Literally the worst company ever. Despise them.

name: Barb Johnson
text: The worst garbage service ever in my life!! I didn't even want to give it one star, but had too.

name: Marcia Caldwell
text: Not enough bad words to describe this company!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

name: Jamie Goodwin
text: I paid for a dumpster to be delivered and was told it would be delivered the next day and it wasn’t. I had to call them to see why it wasn’t delivered and was told it would be deliver by 6:30am today and it’s 8:53 am and I still haven’t gotten what I’ve paid for. The dispatch lady was very rude. Poor service all together!!

name: PATTY BANKS
text: I'm with the Glass Doctor of Tuscaloosa and use Rumsey for our dumpster service. It is so nice to call and actually speak to someone whom by the way is always so friendly and helpful. If they say they are going to do something... they do! We have had to ask for extra pick-ups on occasion and they have always sent a truck promptly. Great service

name: Harley Ryland
text: Good place. Nice guys.

name: Jen Miles
text:
This company violates all city ordinances and are the most unprofessional people, company and services I have ever experienced. I am not a person that posts on reviews at all, this however, is warranted.

This company is supposed to pick up our complex’s garbage after 6 am in the morning. To not ramble, the management team has called and emailed this company over the past year about correcting this. My husband and I work and their trucks continuously come between 2:15 - 4:15 am. They are in violating many ordinances and their contract is going to keep going for a bit more. Nothing more to do but post this in essence to warn people of their continuing incompetence and no regard for residents, bylaws and contractual agreements.

name: Eve Engle
text: I have rented from Rumsey twice. The first time they did not give me a specific day/time of when they would retrieve my rental. They did show up, but several days later. I finally called because I was worried they would charge me extra. This time they came before 8am and I had not been notified to be there to unlock my gates. I live an hour away. I was told they would have to charge me $125 extra to come back. I waited around all day, finally to be told I would have to return the next day to let them in. I am disgusted. I do not recommend this company.

name: Samantha Dorough
text: Been working together with their staff for over a decade. The staff is always professional and helpful in any way.

name: Lela Collum
text: Followed one of their trucks down highway 72 west for over 15 miles to Barton Al where they went towards the tissue plant. This truck had a large dumpster on the back and paper flew out  the entire time down the road. Some “environmental service “

name: Chintan Patel
text:
Bad customer service. Dumpster was not delivered even after 3 days of told delivery date. Then they don't update you the status and then if you call them and tell them about it, they start crying and they are asking their customers to apologise for it.

It was your fault , you don't deliver the dumpster and you don't even call the customer and give update about the delivery date. And then you ask the customer for apologizing if they get angry

My friend I think customer service is an important word you are missing out .

name: Debbie Long
text: Very rude employees, very overpriced.  Quoted 700.00 charged almost 1000.00. Delivered with a male private part on the side and did not even care to clean it off. When we complained about the problems was told to shut up and was hang up on.  This is after we paid of course.

name: Tamer Eltibi
text:
3 weeks no show up to empty the garage
Every time i call they are rude and they will say we will send someone and again no one show up !!!!!

name: Trena Wise
text:
Just a warning to anyone needing a residential dumpster. Rumsey will deliver the dumpster to your house. You pay for 10 days and they will mention that you can keep it longer if needed but they will fail to tell you that they may pick up at 7 am on the 10th day regardless of the time it was dropped off. You MUST call them in advance if you want to keep it longer. They will not call you or tell you the time frame that they pickup so if your pickup date is a Monday,  better call them the prior week to schedule a longer drop off time if you need more time.

I received zero use out of my dumpster and thought I could call first thing Monday morning to have it scheduled longer but was told that it had been picked up at 7 am, didn't even get a full 10 day use out of it and spent almost $400.00. I would have been better off burning my $400.00. If you want to use their service, better make sure you ask the date of pickup and the time frame so you can make a decision if you want to keep it longer as they have very poor communication.

name: El Chechito
text: Late pulls , bad service.

name: Shawn Williams
text: Terrible place to work!

name: Regional Homes of Northport
text: Fast service on dumping containers!

name: Martha22w White
text: I can't say enough about how wonderful it was working with my local guy Andrew.  He was professional and also very personable.  We talked several times about cleaning my garage leading up to today.  He was so helpful.  I would highly recommend Got Junk!!!!

name: Donna Anthony
text: Andrew and his crew of four guys could not have made our experience any easier or more pleasant. Our project took four days but Andrew and the crew were fast, efficient, thorough and extremely professional. I highly recommend giving them a call.

resp.text: Thank you, Donna, for the endorsement.  We very much appreciate your business!

name: Rebecca Grizzle
text: These guys were great.  They showed up on time, gave me a fair quote with no hidden surprises, and got everything in one load. They worked quietly, efficiently, and quickly - and were both super polite and personable.  Could not ask for better!

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words, Rebecca and, of course, for your business.  We are proud of our team, for sure!

name: Kristina Wood
text: These guys are fantastic. Never better customer service. They're prompt, friendly and professional and they did exactly what they said they were going to do for what they said it would cost. I wish I had more junk so I could call them again!

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words, Kristina and, of course, for your business!

name: S W
text:
This was our second time using 1-800-GOT-JUNK ! First time in AZ Second time here in AL. These folks are GREAT FANTASTIC PROFESSIONAL HONEST FAIR WITH STELLAR CUSTOMER SERVICE!
Can you tell we would highly recommend them......
CALL 'EM

resp.text: Wow!  Thanks a million for the review.  And thank you very much for your business!

name: Marian Titlestad
text: Fantastic job!  Friendly and professional! Wish I had more junk, so I could use them again 😉

name: Lynn Bodet
text: Austin was prompt, polite and quite helpful!! Will definitely use again, when needed!!

name: Chinny Chin
text: We had an awesome experience with this company the service was top notch. We will definitely use them again!

resp.text: Thank you Karen.  We very much appreciate your business!

name: John Watts
text: These guys were great !  Had the whole job completed in less than 24 hours of my initial call.  Would highly recommend !

resp.text: Thanks very much Mr. Watts.  We appreciate your business!

name: Michael Norris II
text: They did a great job and was very fast and efficient.

resp.text: Thank you for your 5 star review

name: William Porter
text: This is the second time I have used your service and have not been disappointed either time. The technicians dispatched were on time and very professional.

resp.text: Thank You for your kind words. We are always happy to help

name: Gaillard Teague
text: Very professional and courteous workers.  In addition to that, they did a great job!  Clean as a whistle.

name: Dan Enger
text: Excellent job.  Very efficient and professional!  Will highly recommend

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words, Dan and, of course, for your business.

name: Brenda Carlisle
text: Excellent service.. on time and professional

resp.text: Brenda, we are glad we could help! Thank you for the review.

name: Alexandra Adreon
text: I can’t praise these guys enough. They cleaned out a three bay + work room garage that was loaded to the brim with stuff. It was absolutely overwhelming - years and years of accumulation of just miscellaneous stuff. I knew that there was no way I could tackle the project on my own. Andrew came out and gave me an estimate and before I knew it people were removing and loading things into their trucks and creating a brand new cleaned out work areas and a storage area for me. The guys went above and beyond. It looks absolutely beautiful. they even moved some shelving into the garage for me that I had assembled without me even asking them to. Just beyond kind and professional and efficient. Wonderful. As I continue with other projects around this house/property I’m sure I will give them a call to help! The best!

resp.text: Thanks, Alex, for the kind words. We very much appreciate your business!

name: Perry C. Rucker
text: They were great, prompt and professional. DEFINITELY  recommend them!!!

resp.text: Thank you Perry ... we appreciate your business!

name: Steve Lansing
text:
The service was great and the guys were great.
Very satisfied.
I know who to call next time.

resp.text: Thanks Steve.  We appreciate your business.

name: William Morris
text: I had a very good experience with Got Junk.  They  arrived promptly and were very pleaant.  They got the job done quickly,.  Both employees were curteous and friendly.  I would use again if needed.

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Morris.  We appreciate your business and endorsement.  Have a great day.

name: Lorraine Nalley
text: The guys were great!  They got rid of all my junk and were careful with my hardwood floors.  If I ever need to get rid of more stuff, I will definitely call Got Junk again.  I highly recommend this company.

name: Jackie Clark
text: This company was amazing to work with. Information given was clear and concise. Phone calls were made as promised. Truck arrived on time. The drivers, Andrew and Frank were extremely kind and fast. Overall experience far exceeded my expectations.

resp.text: Thank you, Jackie ... we appreciate your business!

name: Carol Ramirez
text: Very professional. Easy to schedule. Right on time. Very considerate and conscientious while moving stuff to the truck. Definitely recommend this company.

name: Twyla Davis
text: Worked with Trey B. to remove fixtures and a temp wall from a vacant store. He was a true pleasure to work with. Fast, efficient and honest. I would definitely recommend them to others and will be using them moving forward. They get five stars from me!

resp.text: Thank you, Twyla, for your business.  We look forward to working with you in the future.

name: Dylan Pait
text: Andrew and Frank came out and gave me a quick estimate, and Andrew was able to work with me on price points. Great work, they were in and out in less than 30 minutes. Andrew was friendly and professional and although Frank didn’t say much, you can tell he really knows how to handle a man’s junk!

name: Lynnette Hughes
text: He returned our call promptly. Calle the day of the appointment   Calls 30 min before the appointment.  Explained the cost structure and loaded very thing in a timely manor   Very good customer service

name: Annu Nacky
text:
Wow. I wondered about how well they would clean up. They did a great job.
I was impressed by the upfront quote, the professionalism of the two men who did the work, and the speed of the process.
Great service for folks like me who don't have the time, a large truck or knowledge of dumping regulations.
I do recommend them for all sorts of hauling needs. Well done fellows!

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words ... we appreciate your business.

name: Robbie Lynn Irvine
text:
I am a Realtor that had a property with out of town owners. I contacted Got Junk and they came and took two trucks of donations and throw aways..
They were prompt, fast working but handled everything in a very professional way. Ira, Andrew, Frank and Trey did everything they could to make it easy.
I would definitely recommend them to anyone

Robbie Lynn Irvine

resp.text: Thanks for the kind review, Robbie Lynn.  Please don't hesitate to share with your clients and colleagues.  Have a great day!

name: Susan Brown
text: When the time scheduled didn’t work for the size of the job I had for them to do, they went to extraordinary lengths to get my job done on the day scheduled.  I really appreciated it!

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words, Susan.  We appreciate your business

name: Sallie Alligood Deal
text: The guys were great. Gave me plenty of time to decide if there might have been more I wanted to get rid of. Very professional. Two awesome fellas!!

resp.text: Thank you, Sallie. We appreciate your business.

name: Ro OBrien
text: On time.  Friendly.  Great service. Reasonable price.  I will use them again if the need arises.

name: Ray Herold
text: On time, friendly and courteous. We didn't have to do anything - they did it all. And the price was quite reasonable. Would most certainly use them again. Trey and his group are top notch!

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words, Ray.  I'm glad we could help make your move run more smoothly.  We appreciate your business.

name: Erin Cooper
text: We had such a great experience using Got Junk. They were very polite and professional employees. They called in advance of the scheduled time, were prompt, courteous and worked quickly. It was so nice having them remove the items we could not use. I highly recommend Trey and his team!

name: Red Dunahoo
text:
Closing out 3 storage units in Daphne, AL, we generated a small mountain of junk. Had the folks at 1-800-GOT-JUNK come give an estimate and had them start immediately. Frank and Ira were both dresses professionally, clear about the service and wasted no time making the junk disappear!
Over the years I’ve seen 1-800-G-J on TV shows, print ads and social media but never used them myself until today.
I will never hesitate to call them again. I couldn’t be more pleased with the whole experience.

resp.text: Wow .. thanks for the endorsement, Mr. Dunahoo! We very much appreciate your business!

name: Carlos Spears
text:
Seriously easy to use. They made last minute
adjustments to fit our scheduling needs and were polite the whole time. If you have a bunch of stuff that needs getting rid of, and you don't have the energy or interest in loading up trailers full of stuff, then call them.

name: Katina Snider
text:
Moving is never fun and you always have so much more than you remember having!!! Andrew and Walker hauled away a substantial amount of junk for us today. They were both so friendly, polite, professional and just in an amazing mood! They worked very quickly and even swept up after themselves.
I was so impressed with them and the price! Thank you Andrew and Walker for making my day so much easier!!!!! Highly recommend them and this company!!!!

name: Alec Armbrecht
text: I highly recommend Trey Bennett and his people at 1-800-GOT-JUNK. Andrew and Shane were very professional and smartly dressed. They got right to work and got all of my junk loaded and taken away. They created so much room, I need to go buy more stuff.

name: Stephanie Cain
text: Andrew and Trey were awesome! Super friendly and very quick! Purging junk with this crowd was fantastic!

name: mary stewart nelson
text: They were on-time, professional, efficient, and the price was within expected range.

name: Alicia Ferrari
text:
We are in the middle of renovating a four plex and have kitchen appliances, toilets, cabinets etc. 1-800-GOT JUNK saved us time and gave us a peace of mind.
Andrew and the other young gentleman with him were speedy and efficient. Thank y’all so much for taking this weight off our shoulders 👍🏼

name: Pamela D
text: Within a few hours of obtaining a quote, everything was removed quickly and efficiently and we highly recommend them!

resp.text: Thanks for the endorsement, Pamela ... we appreciate your business!

name: Jerry Myers
text: Both young men were very professional,helpful and knew there business.i was very pleased with the cost and service

resp.text: Thanks Jerry ... we appreciate your business.

name: Cile Byrd
text: Great, friendly service! Highly recommend!

name: Emily Montgomery
text: Worth every penny. Great guys.

resp.text: Thank you, Emily.  We very much appreciate your business!

name: William Roberts
text: Excellent service. Would definitely recommend.

name: Douglas Bridges
text: Showed up the same day and quickly removed the junk I needed picked up. Couldn't have been easier.

resp.text: Thanks for your comment and, of course, for your business!

name: Sherry McGowin
text: Highly recommend Trey Bennett and his employees! They reviewed the cost before the work began, showed up on time, and tidied up after everything was loaded.  Excellent work ethic!

name: Pam Maurin
text: Excellent service, would recommend to all.

resp.text: Thank you, Pam.  Please don't hesitate to call if we can help you in the future.

name: Christina Ng
text: First time having u guys help us. He was a hard worker and helped us alot and fast !. Thank u so much

name: Joanne OToole
text: Tray and Andrew did an amazing job when we needed their assistance on a rather urgent basis.  We don’t know what we would of done without their help. I highly recommend 1-800-Got-Junk out of Mobile, AL!

name: Heather Martin
text: Quick and professional service! Will certainly use these guys again.

name: Sally Jackson
text: Very professional, prompt and affordable.  I would use them again

resp.text: Thank you, Sally.  We appreciate your business!

name: Catherine Jordan
text: Both the management and on-site staff did a wonderful job to make sure our needs were met. There were some scheduling challenges on my end and everyone worked to make sure the job got done. Very pleased.

name: Jake Walker
text: Great people and great service.

name: Sheri Nafe
text: I have nothing but good things to say about Trey Bennett's crew.  They were on time, friendly, professional, took care of all the things I wanted hauled off INCLUDING an opossum hiding out in my shed.  The price he quoted was the price I was charged.  I would use his services again and highly recommend him.

name: Matthew Mosteller
text: Trey Bennet and his guys were more than excellent! Courteous and so efficient, great hard workers, and left the whole attic spotless. He is generous with donations of things that could be of use with others . Recommend them with 10 stars!!!

name: L Watkins
text: These guys were fantastic! Courteous, careful and FAST!! Grateful for their help in a long overdue attic clean-out. Still can't believe bagging it all up and hauling it down two flights of stairs was included!!

name: RANDY COTTON
text: Great company. Up front pricing and they took care of the job ahead of schedule. I would recommend them to anyone.

name: Aleta Greenspan
text: On time..professional crew.  Fair and reasonable rates. Free from junk.  Happy again.

name: Not Necessary
text: Had a great experience with these guys quick professional and used every inch of space in the truck that they brought I would use them again in a second

name: Patrice Kinsey
text: Great upfront pricing. Very professional, quick removal of two heavy worn out recliners that were definitely not good enough to donate to the goodwill.   I will definaltely use this company again.

name: Wesley Grogan
text:
It is impossible to recommend Trey Bennett and 1-800-Got-Junk in Mobile enough. I have had to close down a large facility with only a few months notice and generated a massive amount of junk that needed to be discarded. Trey met with me, helped generate a game plan, and has stood behind his word at every moment.

His team is top-notch, works extremely hard, and is always courteous to me and the other employees. They are considerate of the facility and the other equipment, show up on time as scheduled, and always perform at the best of their ability. If you have junk that needs to be removed, Trey provides a service that takes care of all of your needs at a price that is highly competitive. Just a fantastic company all the way around.

name: Arthur “Fire” Ball
text: Friendly and professional staff! I most certainly will use them again in the future when needed!

name: Nicholas Roussos
text: Same day service. On-time. Fast, courteous, and professional.

name: Mike Horton
text:
Excellent ,Quick Service! I was moving from out of town and the Homeowner I bought the new house from left a lot of junk in the garage and in the house! Plus a mattress/boxspring and old TV at the curb. I called 1-800 Got Junk and made an appointment the following morning. With in an hour the next day they  had everything cleaned up and on their truck. Everything was cleaned up and gone before my movers arrived!
The guys were so professional!
This service is worth its weight in Gold.
I will use them again .
Thanks for giving me back my piece of mind!
Michael Horton
Mobile Al.36607
